tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE space_mission_media (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  media_type VARCHAR(50),
  media_content BYTEA,
  capture_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  mission_id UUID
)

CREATE TABLE space_mission_videos (
    video_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    mission_name TEXT,
    video_data BYTEA,
    capture_date TIMESTAMP,
    duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE images (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name TEXT,
    capture_date DATE,
    mission_id INT,
    image_data BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE videos (
    video_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    file_name TEXT,
    capture_date DATE,
    duration_minutes INT,
    mission_id INT,
    video_data BYTEA
);
